address: 6N315 East Ridgewood Drive, Saint Charles, IL 60175
valueProp: Barnes Evans & Lohse LLC, a boutique law firm with national and local practices, specializes in representing end users, developers and institutional clients in connection with their commercial real estate needs. The firm has offices in Maryland and Illinois. The partners at Barnes Evans & Lohse founded the firm based on the principle that they could provide their clients with the quality of representation to be expected from the big firms, but with a rate structure and the personal touch offered by a boutique firm.
